verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, If a soul shall sin through ignorance against any of the commandments of the LORD concerning things which ought not to be done, and shall do against any of them:
verses.web: “Speak to the children of Israel, saying, ‘If anyone sins unintentionally, in any of the things which LORD has commanded not to be done, and does any one of them,
verses.ct: "Tell the people of Israel: When someone sins unintentionally by breaking any of the LORD's commands — doing something that should not be done — here is what must happen:

verses.kjv: If the priest that is anointed do sin according to the sin of the people; then let him bring for his sin, which he hath sinned, a young bullock without blemish unto the LORD for a sin offering.
verses.web: if the anointed priest sins so as to bring guilt on the people, then let him offer for his sin which he has sinned a young bull without defect to LORD for a sin offering.
verses.ct: If the anointed priest sins and brings guilt on the people, he must bring a young bull without any defect to the LORD as a sin offering.

verses.kjv: And he shall bring the bullock unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation before the LORD; and shall lay his hand upon the bullock’s head, and kill the bullock before the LORD.
verses.web: He shall bring the bull to the door of the Tent of Meeting before LORD; and he shall lay his hand on the head of the bull, and kill the bull before LORD.
verses.ct: He must bring the bull to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting before the LORD, lay his hand on the bull's head, and slaughter it there in the LORD's presence.

verses.kjv: And the priest that is anointed shall take of the bullock’s blood, and bring it to the tabernacle of the congregation:
verses.web: The anointed priest shall take some of the blood of the bull, and bring it to the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: The anointed priest must then take some of the bull's blood and carry it into the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall dip his finger in the blood, and sprinkle of the blood seven times before the LORD, before the vail of the sanctuary.
verses.web: The priest shall dip his finger in the blood, and sprinkle some of the blood seven times before LORD, before the veil of the sanctuary.
verses.ct: He must dip his finger in the blood and sprinkle it 7 times before the LORD, in front of the veil of the sanctuary.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall put some of the blood upon the horns of the altar of sweet incense before the LORD, which is in the tabernacle of the congregation; and shall pour all the blood of the bullock at the bottom of the altar of the burnt offering, which is at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.web: The priest shall put some of the blood on the horns of the altar of sweet incense before LORD, which is in the Tent of Meeting; and he shall pour out the rest of the blood of the bull at the base of the altar of burnt offering, which is at the door of the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: Then the priest must smear some of the blood on the horns of the incense altar that stands before the LORD inside the Tent of Meeting. He must pour out the rest of the bull's blood at the base of the burnt offering altar, which stands at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: And he shall take off from it all the fat of the bullock for the sin offering; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards,
verses.web: He shall take all the fat of the bull of the sin offering from it: the fat that covers the innards, and all the fat that is on the innards,
verses.ct: He must remove all the fat from the bull of the sin offering — the fat covering the internal organs and all the fat attached to them,

verses.kjv: And the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, it shall he take away,
verses.web: and the two kidneys, and the fat that is on them, which is by the loins, and the cover on the liver, with the kidneys, he shall remove,
verses.ct: both kidneys with the fat around them near the loins, and the covering of the liver, which he must remove along with the kidneys.

verses.kjv: As it was taken off from the bullock of the sacrifice of peace offerings: and the priest shall burn them upon the altar of the burnt offering.
verses.web: as it is removed from the bull of the sacrifice of peace offerings. The priest shall burn them on the altar of burnt offering.
verses.ct: These parts must be removed just as they are from a bull offered as a peace offering. Then the priest must burn them on the altar of burnt offering.

verses.kjv: And the skin of the bullock, and all his flesh, with his head, and with his legs, and his inwards, and his dung,
verses.web: He shall carry the bull’s skin, all its meat, with its head, and with its legs, its innards, and its dung
verses.ct: But the bull's hide, all its meat, its head, its legs, its internal organs, and its dung —

verses.kjv: Even the whole bullock shall he carry forth without the camp unto a clean place, where the ashes are poured out, and burn him on the wood with fire: where the ashes are poured out shall he be burnt.
verses.web: —all the rest of the bull—outside of the camp to a clean place where the ashes are poured out, and burn it on wood with fire. It shall be burned where the ashes are poured out.
verses.ct: the entire rest of the bull — must be carried outside the camp to a ceremonially clean place where ashes are dumped. There it must be burned on a wood fire, right on the ash heap.

verses.kjv: And if the whole congregation of Israel sin through ignorance, and the thing be hid from the eyes of the assembly, and they have done somewhat against any of the commandments of the LORD concerning things which should not be done, and are guilty;
verses.web: “ ‘If the whole congregation of Israel sins, and the thing is hidden from the eyes of the assembly, and they have done any of the things which LORD has commanded not to be done, and are guilty;
verses.ct: If the entire community of Israel sins unintentionally — even if the assembly doesn't realize it — and they break any of the LORD's commands by doing something that should not be done, they are guilty.

verses.kjv: When the sin, which they have sinned against it, is known, then the congregation shall offer a young bullock for the sin, and bring him before the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.web: when the sin in which they have sinned is known, then the assembly shall offer a young bull for a sin offering, and bring it before the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: When the sin they committed becomes known, the assembly must bring a young bull as a sin offering and present it before the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: And the elders of the congregation shall lay their hands upon the head of the bullock before the LORD: and the bullock shall be killed before the LORD.
verses.web: The elders of the congregation shall lay their hands on the head of the bull before LORD; and the bull shall be killed before LORD.
verses.ct: The elders of the community must lay their hands on the bull's head before the LORD, and the bull must be slaughtered in the LORD's presence.

verses.kjv: And the priest that is anointed shall bring of the bullock’s blood to the tabernacle of the congregation:
verses.web: The anointed priest shall bring some of the blood of the bull to the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: The anointed priest must bring some of the bull's blood into the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall dip his finger in some of the blood, and sprinkle it seven times before the LORD, even before the vail.
verses.web: The priest shall dip his finger in the blood and sprinkle it seven times before LORD, before the veil.
verses.ct: He must dip his finger in the blood and sprinkle it 7 times before the LORD, in front of the veil.

verses.kjv: And he shall put some of the blood upon the horns of the altar which is before the LORD, that is in the tabernacle of the congregation, and shall pour out all the blood at the bottom of the altar of the burnt offering, which is at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.web: He shall put some of the blood on the horns of the altar which is before LORD, that is in the Tent of Meeting; and the rest of the blood he shall pour out at the base of the altar of burnt offering, which is at the door of the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: Then he must smear some of the blood on the horns of the altar that stands before the LORD inside the Tent of Meeting. He must pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the burnt offering altar at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: And he shall take all his fat from him, and burn it upon the altar.
verses.web: All its fat he shall take from it, and burn it on the altar.
verses.ct: He must remove all the fat from the bull and burn it on the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall do with the bullock as he did with the bullock for a sin offering, so shall he do with this: and the priest shall make an atonement for them, and it shall be forgiven them.
verses.web: Thus shall he do with the bull; as he did with the bull of the sin offering, so shall he do with this; and the priest shall make atonement for them, and they shall be forgiven.
verses.ct: He must handle this bull exactly the same way he handled the bull for the priest's sin offering. Through this process, the priest will make atonement for the people, and they will be forgiven.

verses.kjv: And he shall carry forth the bullock without the camp, and burn him as he burned the first bullock: it is a sin offering for the congregation.
verses.web: He shall carry the bull outside the camp, and burn it as he burned the first bull. It is the sin offering for the assembly.
verses.ct: Then he must carry the bull outside the camp and burn it, just as he burned the first bull. This is the sin offering for the entire assembly.

verses.kjv: When a ruler hath sinned, and done somewhat through ignorance against any of the commandments of the LORD his God concerning things which should not be done, and is guilty;
verses.web: “ ‘When a ruler sins, and unwittingly does any one of all the things which LORD his God has commanded not to be done, and is guilty,
verses.ct: When a leader sins by unintentionally breaking any of the commands of the LORD his God — doing something that should not be done — he is guilty.

verses.kjv: Or if his sin, wherein he hath sinned, come to his knowledge; he shall bring his offering, a kid of the goats, a male without blemish:
verses.web: if his sin in which he has sinned is made known to him, he shall bring as his offering a goat, a male without defect.
verses.ct: When the sin he committed is brought to his attention, he must bring as his offering a male goat without any defect.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the goat, and kill it in the place where they kill the burnt offering before the LORD: it is a sin offering.
verses.web: He shall lay his hand on the head of the goat, and kill it in the place where they kill the burnt offering before LORD. It is a sin offering.
verses.ct: He must lay his hand on the goat's head and slaughter it at the same place where burnt offerings are killed before the LORD. This is a sin offering.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall take of the blood of the sin offering with his finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt offering, and shall pour out his blood at the bottom of the altar of burnt offering.
verses.web: The priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering with his finger, and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering. He shall pour out the rest of its blood at the base of the altar of burnt offering.
verses.ct: The priest must take some of the blood from the sin offering with his finger and smear it on the horns of the burnt offering altar. Then he must pour out the rest of the blood at the base of that altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall burn all his fat upon the altar, as the fat of the sacrifice of peace offerings: and the priest shall make an atonement for him as concerning his sin, and it shall be forgiven him.
verses.web: All its fat he shall burn on the altar, like the fat of the sacrifice of peace offerings; and the priest shall make atonement for him concerning his sin, and he will be forgiven.
verses.ct: He must burn all the fat on the altar, just like the fat from a peace offering. In this way the priest will make atonement for the leader's sin, and he will be forgiven.

verses.kjv: And if any one of the common people sin through ignorance, while he doeth somewhat against any of the commandments of the LORD concerning things which ought not to be done, and be guilty;
verses.web: “ ‘If anyone of the common people sins unwittingly, in doing any of the things which LORD has commanded not to be done, and is guilty,
verses.ct: If an ordinary person sins unintentionally by breaking any of the LORD's commands — doing something that should not be done — that person is guilty.

verses.kjv: Or if his sin, which he hath sinned, come to his knowledge: then he shall bring his offering, a kid of the goats, a female without blemish, for his sin which he hath sinned.
verses.web: if his sin which he has sinned is made known to him, then he shall bring for his offering a goat, a female without defect, for his sin which he has sinned.
verses.ct: When the sin they committed is brought to their attention, they must bring a female goat without any defect as their offering for that sin.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay the sin offering in the place of the burnt offering.
verses.web: He shall lay his hand on the head of the sin offering, and kill the sin offering in the place of burnt offering.
verses.ct: They must lay their hand on the head of the sin offering and slaughter it at the place where burnt offerings are killed.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall take of the blood thereof with his finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt offering, and shall pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the altar.
verses.web: The priest shall take some of its blood with his finger, and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering; and the rest of its blood he shall pour out at the base of the altar.
verses.ct: The priest must take some of its blood with his finger and smear it on the horns of the burnt offering altar. Then he must pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall take away all the fat thereof, as the fat is taken away from off the sacrifice of peace offerings; and the priest shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savour unto the LORD; and the priest shall make an atonement for him, and it shall be forgiven him.
verses.web: All its fat he shall take away, like the fat is taken away from the sacrifice of peace offerings; and the priest shall burn it on the altar for a pleasant aroma to LORD; and the priest shall make atonement for him, and he will be forgiven.
verses.ct: He must remove all the fat, just as fat is removed from a peace offering, and the priest must burn it on the altar as a pleasing aroma to the LORD. In this way the priest will make atonement for that person, and they will be forgiven.

verses.kjv: And if he bring a lamb for a sin offering, he shall bring it a female without blemish.
verses.web: “ ‘If he brings a lamb as his offering for a sin offering, he shall bring a female without defect.
verses.ct: If someone brings a lamb as a sin offering, it must be a female without any defect.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay it for a sin offering in the place where they kill the burnt offering.
verses.web: He shall lay his hand on the head of the sin offering, and kill it for a sin offering in the place where they kill the burnt offering.
verses.ct: They must lay their hand on the head of the sin offering and slaughter it as a sin offering at the place where burnt offerings are killed.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall take of the blood of the sin offering with his finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt offering, and shall pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the altar:
verses.web: The priest shall take some of the blood of the sin offering with his finger, and put it on the horns of the altar of burnt offering; and all the rest of its blood he shall pour out at the base of the altar.
verses.ct: The priest must take some of the blood from the sin offering with his finger and smear it on the horns of the burnt offering altar. Then he must pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall take away all the fat thereof, as the fat of the lamb is taken away from the sacrifice of the peace offerings; and the priest shall burn them upon the altar, according to the offerings made by fire unto the LORD: and the priest shall make an atonement for his sin that he hath committed, and it shall be forgiven him.
verses.web: He shall remove all its fat, like the fat of the lamb is removed from the sacrifice of peace offerings. The priest shall burn them on the altar, on the offerings of LORD made by fire. The priest shall make atonement for him concerning his sin that he has sinned, and he will be forgiven.
verses.ct: He must remove all the fat, just as the fat is removed from a lamb offered as a peace offering. The priest must burn these pieces on the altar along with the other fire offerings to the LORD. In this way the priest will make atonement for the sin that person committed, and they will be forgiven."
